entry.content:
Description

This presentation will explore the significance of integrating AI into the Secure Software Development Life Cycle (SSDLC) to proactively address security vulnerabilities in Python code. I will discuss the OWASP Top 10 2021 security risks, demonstrate common insecure coding practices in Python, and showcase how to leverage the AI model to detect and mitigate these vulnerabilities. The session is designed to provide both a managerial and technical perspective on improving software security through AI.
